code: var nextTodoId=0;export var addTodo=function addTodo(text){return{type:'ADD_TODO',id:nextTodoId++,text};};export var setVisibilityFilter=function setVisibilityFilter(filter){return{type:'SET_VISIBILITY_FILTER',filter};};export var toggleTodo=function toggleTodo(id){return{type:'TOGGLE_TODO',id};};export var VisibilityFilters={SHOW_ALL:'SHOW_ALL',SHOW_COMPLETED:'SHOW_COMPLETED',SHOW_ACTIVE:'SHOW_ACTIVE'};export var removeTodo=function removeTodo(id){return{type:'REMOVE_TODO',id};};
